languages.text: {n}Абеляр с мрачной миной забирает протянутый вам подарок. Скоморох, так и не вручивший ключ тому, кому он предназначался, потешно изображает рыдания и отступает в тень.{/n}

{n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр с мрачной миной забирает протянутый вам подарок. Скоморох, так и не вручивший ключ тому, кому он предназначался, потешно изображает рыдания и отступает в тень.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着严峻的表情，替你收下了礼物。小丑做了个滑稽、夸张的姿势，表示无法将钥匙亲手交给你，他心中无比悲痛，随后便退回到总督的阴影之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着严峻的表情，替你收下了礼物。小丑做了个滑稽、夸张的姿势，表示无法将钥匙亲手交给你，他心中无比悲痛，随后便退回到总督的阴影之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは険しい表情を浮かべながら、あなたの代わりにプレゼントを受け取った。道化は滑稽で大げさな仕草で、鍵を直接あなたに渡せなかったことへの悲しみを表現してみせると、総督の背後へと退いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは険しい表情を浮かべながら、あなたの代わりにプレゼントを受け取った。道化は滑稽で大げさな仕草で、鍵を直接あなたに渡せなかったことへの悲しみを表現してみせると、総督の背後へと退いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard acepta el regalo en tu nombre con expresión sombría. Mediante gestos cómicamente exagerados, el bufón expresa su pesadumbre por no haberte podido entregar en mano la llave, y luego retrocede hasta quedar a la sombra del gobernador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, sert bir ifadeyle armağanı senin yerine kabul ediyor. Soytarı, komik derecede abartılı hareketlerle anahtarı doğruda sana verememiş olmanın üzüntüsünü gösterip sonrasında valinin gölgesine sığınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, sert bir ifadeyle armağanı senin yerine kabul ediyor. Soytarı, komik derecede abartılı hareketlerle anahtarı doğruda sana verememiş olmanın üzüntüsünü gösterip sonrasında valinin gölgesine sığınıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard accepte le cadeau à votre place d'un air sinistre. Le bouffon exprime sa tristesse de ne pas avoir pu vous remettre la clé en main propre avec force gestes comiquement exagérés, avant de se réfugier dans l'ombre du gouverneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, wearing a grim expression, accepts the gift in your stead. Through comically exaggerated gestures, the fool displays his grief at having been unable to hand you the key directly, then steps back into the governor's shadow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard accepte le cadeau à votre place d'un air sinistre. Le bouffon exprime sa tristesse de ne pas avoir pu vous remettre la clé en main propre avec force gestes comiquement exagérés, avant de se réfugier dans l'ombre du gouverneur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard nimmt das Geschenk mit grimmiger Miene an deiner Stelle entgegen. Mit einigen komisch überzeichneten Gesten bringt der Narr sein Bedauern zum Ausdruck, dir den Schlüssel nicht direkt überreichen zu können, ehe er zurückweicht und im Schatten des Gouverneurs verschwindet.{/n}
